Title: Homity pie
Menu: Celery and carrot with tzatziki dip

Body.Title: Mushrooms on toast
Body.Body: Toast two slices of wholemeal bread from a 400g loaf, and top with tasty button or closed mushrooms, pan fried in low calorie spray. This quick and easy breakfast is perfect for starting your day! Follow with an apple and bunch of grapes.

Body.Title: Spicy roasted root veg soup
Body.Body: This tasty and delicious soup is full of flavour and great to help kick-start your weight loss. For added substance, dive in with Slimming World wedges. Enjoy grapes and bananas for dessert.

Body.Title: Homity pie
Body.Body: Tuck into this delicious healthy homity pie made from potatoes, leeks, onions, peas and cheese. Serve with a huge garden salad. For pud, tuck into a bowl of fat free yogurt with blueberries and raspberries.

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Celery and carrot sticks dipped in homemade tzatziki dip (fat free plain yogurt, cucumber, mint and garlic). Plus fresh fruit whenever you like!

Title: Indian vegetable curry
Menu: Cucumber with fat free natural cottage cheese

Body.Title: Sausage, mushrooms & tomatoes
Body.Body: Tuck into Quorn low fat sausages, mushrooms and tinned tomatoes. Follow with strawberries, raspberries and grapes.

Body.Title: Cheesy beans on toast
Body.Body: A classic and good old favourite, tuck into a tin (or two) of baked beans on top of 2 toasted slices of bread from a 400g wholemeal loaf. Grate 30g of cheddar on top and watch it melt before you dive in! You could even turn it into a cheesy bean toastie! Follow with juicy pear and melon slices.

Body.Title: Indian vegetable curry
Body.Body: Serve lashings of this creamy vegetable curry over boiled rice and enjoy your ‘fakeaway.’ Ginger, chilli, turmeric and garlic create a subtle yet spicy combination for this delicious curry. Follow your meal with an exotic fruit salad, including mango, pineapples, kiwi and melon.

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Dip slices of cucumber into fat free natural cottage cheese and munch on throughout the day, roll up Quorn chicken style slices and dip away! Enjoy fresh fruit whenever you want!

Title: Red pepper, spinach and sweet potato tortilla
Menu: Sweet potato wedges and homemade tasty dip

Body.Title: Scrambled eggs on toast
Body.Body: Scramble 2 (or more) eggs over a medium heat and add seasoning to taste. Toast 2 slices of bread from a 400g wholemeal loaf and tip the scrambled eggs on top. If you fancy tomato or brown sauce add 1 Syn per tsp.

Body.Title: Red pepper, spinach & sweet potato tortilla
Body.Body: Healthy and tasty, this tortilla is packed with onions, sweet potatoes, peppers, and spinach. Serve with a large garden salad.

Body.Title: Spaghetti Bolognese
Body.Body: Serve lashings of this creamy vegetable curry over boiled rice and enjoy your ‘fakeaway.’ Ginger, chilli, turmeric and garlic create a subtle yet spicy combination for this delicious curry. Follow your meal with an exotic fruit salad, including mango, pineapples, kiwi and melon.

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Rustle up some sweet potato wedges and make your own tasty dip – chop up a red chilli, chopped coriander and a squeeze of lemon juice, add to fat free plain yogurt, mix well and hey presto... a delicious dip for your wedges.

Title: Fruity porridge
Menu: Hard boiled eggs, carrots and peppers with homemade houmous

Body.Title: Fruity porridge
Body.Body: Make a bowl of porridge using 35g porridge oats and milk from your allowance. Top with a dollop of fat-free natural yogurt, frozen berries and 1 level tsp runny honey drizzled over (1 Syn).

Body.Title: Garlic mushroom jackets
Body.Body: Pop a potato or two in the oven and ‘bake’ until crispy and brown. Make up a saucepan of delicious garlic mushrooms and tuck in whilst hot! Creamy and delicious, and you can have seconds!

Body.Title: Quick vegetable risotto
Body.Body:
Enjoy a bowl or two of this delicious and filling veg risotto. Packed with onions, courgettes, greens beans, cherry tomatoes, and any other veg you fancy!

Follow with a refreshing fruit salad bowl with all your favourite fresh fruits.

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Hard boiled eggs, carrot sticks and peppers dipped in Slimming World’s homemade houmous.

Title: Egg, tomato and mushroom chip bake
Menu: Couscous with chopped spring onion, cucumber, carrots and tomatoes

Body.Title: Tasty cereal and fruit
Body.Body: Pour 35g Kellogg's All-Bran Yogurty Flakes in a bowl and top with some of your milk allowance, sweet strawberries, raspberries and grapes.

Body.Title: Soup and salad
Body.Body: Start with a bed of crisp iceberg lettuce leaves topped with sliced beetroot, tomato wedges and crunchy coleslaw. Then serve a bowl or two of this smooth and tasty butternut squash soup.

Body.Title: Egg, tomato and mushroom chip bake
Body.Body:
Enjoy spoonfuls of this delicious one pot wonder. Egg, tomato and mushroom chip bake is perfect when you're a little pushed for time and want something comforting and tasty.

For dessert, chop up a banana or two, mix through fat free plain yogurt and drizzle 1 tsp of runny honey over (1 Syn).

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Make up some couscous to snack on throughout the day – add lemon juice and herbs to your couscous with tomatoes, cucumber, grated carrot and spring onions.

Title: Frittata and salad
Menu: Salad, butter beans, broad beans and rice

Body.Title: Boiled eggs ‘n’ soldiers
Body.Body: Take 2 slices of bread from a 400g wholemeal loaf, toast and cut into strips. Dunk into perfectly-boiled eggs (bring a pan of water to the boil, add your eggs and time them for exactly 4½ minutes).

Body.Title: Frittata and salad
Body.Body: Baked to perfection, this vegetable frittata is delicious and filling, and Free, so you can snack on it throughout the day too! Serve with a side salad of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, sliced peppers and spring onions. Finish with juicy chunks of pineapple.

Body.Title: Quorn moussaka with cheese
Body.Body:
Tasty and packed with flavour, sprinkle 30g cheddar cheese on the top of your delicious Quorn mousakka before it goes in the oven, and enjoy the cheese topped delight it brings.

Follow your meal with blueberries in fat free plain yogurt with 1 level tsp runny honey drizzled through (1 Syn).

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: If there's any spare after lunch, tuck into your leftover frittata. Make up a box of salad, add butter beans, broad beans and rice.

Title: Moroccan veg stew with mixed herb couscous

Body.Title: Farmhouse pizza omelette
Body.Body: Start the day as you mean to go on and delve into this tasty farmhouse pizza omelette. Switch the ham for Quorn ham slices and enjoy! Have a couple of bananas to follow.

Body.Title: Farfalle with beans & vegetables
Body.Body: Quick, easy and tastes delicious hot or cold, serve up farfalle with beans & veg for lunch with a bowl of your favourite salad. Enjoy fat free plain yogurt and fruit for dessert.

Body.Title: Moroccan veg stew & cous cous
Body.Body: Enjoy spoonfuls of Moroccan veg stew & cous cous with a Weight Watchers wholemeal pitta bread. Packed with flavour, this is a fantastic dish to wow everyone at your table! Indulge in a homemade cardamom & vanilla panacotta, made with agar-agar – a vegetarian-friendly gelatine.

Body.Title: Snacks: wherever, whenever and however much you like!
Body.Body: Slimming World's famous chips are fantastic! Fat free natural cottage cheese works great as a dip too, or sprinkle some piri piri seasoning over to add a bit of spice and flavour.
